note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Intro
Written in C#. Allows for building directed acyclic graphs (DAGs), and hierarchical composite graphs (inspired by dot - see [http://www.graphviz.org/](http://www.graphviz.org/)).

This software is released under the [Gnu General Public License](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.txt).

### Major Features
* Programmatic building of in-memory DAGs
* Convert between in-memory DAG and C# XElements

### Planned Updates
* Incorporate NDoc documentation
* Convert between in-memory DAG and JSON
* Convert pivot table data to a DAG
* Convert between in-memory DAG and SVG
* Configure non-hierarchical (flat-only) build mode.
* Configure a tree-only build mode.
* AddSubgraph method.
* Merge graphs using two root nodes.

### Support or Contact
Email me at jason.drake@fluxtree.com. Please put GraphComposite in the subject.
tagline: Programmatic graph building and transformations between popular graph markup formats.
name: GraphComposite
